CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 17, 1955, pg. A24 reads:"United We Sing - These students participated in nineteenth annual United We Sing at Carnegie Music Hall, Sunday. The Peabody High School and the Schenley High School choirs were the only choirs form the Pittsburgh public schools which participated.  Miss Elliott and Dr. Bidwell conducted.  Front row, left to right; Rose Balkovec and Lois Dorsey.  Second row, same order: Elizabeth Hicks and Georgene Matesich.  All are members of Schenley High's A Cappella Choir. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of four members of Schenley High School A Cappella Choir, from left, front row: Rose Balkovec and Lois Dorsey; second row: Elizabeth Hicks and Georgene Matesich, posed on staircase in Carnegie Music Hall
CatSubject_tab: Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Interiors--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Eyeglasses--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Stairs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Singing--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Choirs (Music)--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Carnegie Music Hall (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Dorsey, Lois Lee.
